string.name: camera_permission_reason
string.value: Camera permission is required for scanning QR codes

string.name: location_permission_reason
string.value: Location permission is required for map and navigation features

string.name: location_background_permission_reason
string.value: Background location permission is required for continuous location updates

string.name: read_media_permission_reason
string.value: Read media permission is required to access media files on the device

string.name: write_media_permission_reason
string.value: Write media permission is required to save screenshots and files

string.name: read_imagevideo_permission_reason
string.value: Read image/video permission is required to access images and videos on the device

string.name: write_imagevideo_permission_reason
string.value: Write image/video permission is required to save screenshots and images
